# WEAPON::HAS_WEAPON_GOT_WEAPON_COMPONENT

## Summary
Check if the weapon (created via CREATE_WEAPON_OBJECT) has the specified weapon component

## Parameters
* **OBJECT_INDEX** weaponObject
* **WEAPONCOMPONENT_TYPE** weaponComponent

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
see DOES_WEAPON_TAKE_WEAPON_COMPONENT for full list of weapons & components
